metadata.name: All I Need by Chandon XO
metadata.description:
I began writing “All I Need” several days after my ex left me on my birthday. Writing this song was one of my ways to cope and grow from that toxic relationship. 

"All I Need" is simply me telling myself "You are enough and deserve better."

This is the first Dofat Family production in Web3. Produced by my father Tony Dofat, Grammy-Nominated Multi-Platinum Producer and my younger brother Dofiji. Art was created by Aaron, the artist of Mellow Park NFT project and Sky City.

As a holder, you will be granted WL spots for Chandon XO’s future music nft releases. If you hold 3, you will receive an exclusive Sky City x Chandon XO shirt that will only be available through minting (not for sale).

*Snapshot will be taken 7 days after release

Written & Recorded by Chandon XO  
Produced by Tony Dofat & Dofiji  
Mixed & Mastered by Tony Dofat at Invite Only Studios - New York, NY
